pr_title: MULE-18489: CCE with @ConfigOverrides on params of different types

timeline.message: MULE-18489: CCE with @ConfigOverrides on params of different types
MULE-18489: CCE with @ConfigOverrides on params of different types

timeline.author: marianogonzalez

timeline.bodyText: what's this for? Actually, if you look at usages, this parameter is just for testing as in any other situation it's always null .
timeline.author: marianogonzalez

replies.bodyText: so that i can toggle this by setting the logger to TRACE
replies.author: elrodro83

timeline.bodyText: unconsistent use of DEBUG vs TRACING
timeline.author: marianogonzalez

timeline.bodyText: what's this representation thing for? Wasn't the problem just about the wrong type of visitor being used?
timeline.author: marianogonzalez

replies.bodyText: this is just for the WARN message being logged in the case the types have to be converted, to proivde infromation about where the parameter is defined.
replies.author: elrodro83
